# htw-berlin-chat-bubble



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                            | Type      | Default     |
| ---------- | ---------- | -------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `dark`     | `dark`     | use dark mode if true                  | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `datetime` | `datetime` | set date and time of message           | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `fullname` | `fullname` | full name of user or group name        | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `received` | `received` | set true if this is a received message | `boolean` | `false`     |
